message: Hi Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to purchase [Product Name] for a price of $1250000. This product has incredible value, and I believe it will be a significant asset to your business. I'm confident this offer will be mutually beneficial.  Let me know your thoughts.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate the value of the product, I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $950000? I believe this would still be a valuable addition to my collection.

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product.  While I understand your budget constraints, $950000 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1100000, which is a significant compromise on my end.  This price still offers you a great deal on a product with substantial value.  I'm confident we can find a solution that benefits both of us.

Thank you for considering my budgetary constraints, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. I would like to propose a price of $1000000 for the product. I believe this would be a fair compromise for both parties involved.
